name: BirdReign
description: A really really really bad game for my first game that I am uploading for MiniJam:99. I wanted to do so much more with it but I had so many problems mainly with the collisions. Hopefully I can go back to this later  and fix some of the problems but at the moment I don't have enough time and can not find any fix for it. So for now you can enjoy some lofi and some "pretty" scenery.
